metadata.title: CVE-2022-48804 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:vt_ioctl: fix array_index_nospec in vt_setactivatearray_index_nospec ensures that an out-of-bounds value is set to zeroon the transient path. Decreasing the value by one afterwards causesa transient integer underflow. vsa.console should be decreased firstand then sanitized with array_index_nospec.Kasper Acknowledgements: Jakob Koschel, Brian Johannesmeyer, KavehRazavi, Herbert Bos, Cristiano Giuffrida from the VUSec group at VUAmsterdam.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
